amendment.description: Insert after final bill section: \ SEC. . SENSE OF CONGRESS REGARDING WAIT TIMES FOR VETERANS \ It is the the sense of Congress that no veteran should wait more than thirty days for an initial doctor's appointment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in the Congressional Record to express the sense of Congress that no veteran should wait more than 30 days for an initial doctor's appointment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Lynch.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
